description: A face-to-face course focusing on solving computational problems in KS3 computing.
A course designed for supporting GCSE computer science students at grades 1-3.

courseTitle: New Subject Leaders of Secondary Computing - Remote
description: A course aimed at new subject leaders in secondary computing, offered face-to-face to provide hands-on leadership training.

courseTitle: Adapted teaching and effective learning interventions in secondary computing
description: Develop an evidence-informed approach to education recovery over a sustained period, securing the computing education of young people following a period of great disruption..
